title: Could Self Mystery Gifting return for a little while for us, just like on the NA Server?

embed.description: Purchasing a Mystery Skin will unlock an unowned skin worth 520 RP or more (that could get you a discount of 84% off a skin)! As with the previous rounds of Mystery Skins, you can only unlock skins for champions you own.

body: Self Mystery Gifting often drops by for a week or so every now and then, whether its for an event, special occasion, or whatever. Self mystery gifting seems to be back for a little while for the NA server, just wondering if OCE and other servers could also grab some.

Hey KanpaiForOppai,
